message.entry: N-D sparse output arrays are not supported.
Complex replication factors are not supported.
Replication factors must be nonnegative integer-valued scalars or vectors.
In repelem(v, N), N must be a scalar or a vector of length equal to v.
In repelem(A, N1, N2, ..., Nn), Nj must be a scalar or a vector of length size(A, j).
With two inputs, the first argument must be a vector. Use three-input syntax for matrices.
